channel.title: I need your help! PSA
channel.description:
I'm doing a pitch for a PSA project and I might actually make it if I have the time.
It's about the "Guilty Upon Accusation" law soon-to-be passed in New Zealand.
If you want to know about it just google section 92 guilty or something.
But that's not what this is about. I need to find PSAs just like what I'm doing.
What I'm doing is just: Black text on white background. With a lot of motion graphics with the text.
If anyone has seen any PSAs or just videos involving this style (plain background with text) or text with effects and stuff on it pleaseee post it here.
I need to show these videos kind of like "Here's what it might kinda look like"

item.title: I need your help! PSA
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Doesn’t necessarily have to be black and white text only. Just something that has something similar really.

What PaulT posted was nice, I’ll use that.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2009, 04:18:12 pm[/size][hr]
I guess I should just said anything with motion graphics on text. That’s the general idea, and most of that is just empty backgrounds and text.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your help! PSA
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

This isn’t exactly black on white, it does show how simple effects can be used on text for powerful results. And it’s a fucking hilarious video, if you’re into that whole irony thing. If you can’t handle propaganda skip to the last 30 seconds.

Read full topic
